**Summary**
• Lenovo Legion Go 2 confirmed for Xbox FSE in spring 2026.
• Buyers can manually switch to Xbox mode after update.
• First non-Asus handheld to get this Xbox Windows experience.

Impact — Lenovo’s move cements its position in the gaming handheld market with exclusive Xbox features.
